required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Immediate Implant With no Graft , Autogenous Graft or Xenograft.
clinical_study.official_title: Immediate Implant Placement in Maxillary Esthetic Zone Without Augmenting the Jumping Gap Versus the Use of Autogenous Bone Particulates or Demineralized Bovine Bone Graft (Randomized Clinical Trial)

brief_summary.textblock: Immediate implant placement with no graft , autogenous graft or xenograft with provisionalization.

detailed_description.textblock: Immediate implant placement in maxillary esthetic zone without augmenting the jumping gap versus the use of autogenous bone particulates or demineralized bovine bone graft (Randomized Clinical Trial)

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: Immediate implant placement in maxillary esthetic zone without augmenting the jumping gap versus the use of autogenous bone particulates or demineralized bovine bone graft.
study_design_info.masking_description: Immediate implant placement in maxillary esthetic zone without augmenting the jumping gap versus the use of autogenous bone particulates or demineralized bovine bone graft.

primary_outcome.description: Evaluation the thickness of the facial bony wall by millimeter in the CBCT
evaluation of interproximal bone changes by millimeter in the CBCT

secondary_outcome.description: evaluation of soft tissue changes surround implant by pink aesthetic score

arm_group.description: under local anaesthesia patients hopeless teeth are be extracted. then immediate implant is palced with no graft and immediate temporary prothesis is loaded upon the immediate implants.implant stability is evaluated immediately and 3 months post operatively

under local anaesthesia patients hopeless teeth are be extracted. then immediate implant is palced with autogenous bone graft and immediate temporary prothesis is loaded upon the immediate implants.implant stability is evaluated immediately and 3 months post operatively

under local anaesthesia patients hopeless teeth are be extracted. then immediate implant is palced withxenograft and immediate temporary prothesis is loaded upon the immediate implants.implant stability is evaluated immediately and 3 months post operatively

intervention.description: immediate implant with immediate loading using no graft
immediate implant with immediate loading using autogenous bone graft
immediate implant with immediate loading using (Geistlich Bio-Oss®) xenograft

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- patients with non-restorable teeth
Exclusion Criteria:
- intra oral pathology and systemic conditions that contraindicate dental implants.

overall_official.affiliation: Egypt Faculty of dentistry Cairo University
